version_description:
What’s new:
1. We are glad to launch the tech tree of UK light cruisers (beta version). There may be major balance adjustments in the future weeks according to log data and players’ feedback. Thank you for your understanding and support.
2. Recovering the waiting time for PvP match before entering high profit PVE.
3. Raising the requirements for using CV in global arena: pass the stage 2 of the advanced CV Training.
